verses.verse: And the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, set <WH7760> your face <WH6440> toward Jerusalem <WH3389>, and drop <WH5197> your word toward the holy places <WH4720>, and prophesy <WH5012> against the land <WH127> of Israel <WH3478>,

And say <WH559> to the land <WH127> of Israel <WH3478>, Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>; Behold <WH3318>, I am against you, and will draw forth my sword <WH2719> out of his sheath <WH8593>, and will cut off <WH3772> from you the righteous <WH6662> and the wicked <WH7563>.

Seeing <WH3282> then that I will cut off <WH3772> from you the righteous <WH6662> and the wicked <WH7563>, therefore shall my sword <WH2719> go forth <WH3318> out of his sheath <WH8593> against all flesh <WH1320> from the south <WH5045> to the north <WH6828>:
That all flesh <WH1320> may know <WH3045> that I the Lord <WH3068> have drawn forth <WH3318> my sword <WH2719> out of his sheath <WH8593>: it shall not return any more <WH7725>.
Sigh <WH584> therefore <WH1121>, you son of man <WH120>, with the breaking <WH7670> of your body <WH4975>; and with bitterness <WH4814> sigh <WH584> before their eyes <WH5869>.

And it shall be <WH559>, when they say unto you <WH584>, Therefore sighest you <WH559>? that you shall answer, For the news <WH8052>; because it comes <WH935>: and every heart <WH3820> shall melt <WH4549>, and all hands <WH3027> shall be feeble <WH7503>, and every spirit <WH7307> shall faint <WH3543>, and all knees <WH1290> shall be weak <WH3212> as water <WH4325>: behold <WH935>, it comes, and shall be brought to pass <WH1961>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>.
Again the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, prophesy <WH5012>, and say <WH559>, Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>; Say <WH559>, A sword <WH2719>, a sword <WH2719> is sharpened <WH2300>, and also polished <WH4803>:

It is sharpened <WH2300> to make a severe <WH2874> slaughter <WH2873>; it is polished <WH4178> that it may glitter <WH1300>: should <WH176> we then make mirth <WH7797>? it rejects <WH3988> the rod <WH7626> of my son <WH1121>, as every tree <WH6086>.

And he has given <WH5414> it to be polished <WH4803>, that it may be handled <WH3709>: this sword <WH2719> is sharpened <WH2300>, and it is polished <WH4178>, to give <WH5414> it into the hand <WH3027> of the slayer <WH2026>.

Cry <WH2199> and howl <WH3213>, son <WH1121> of man <WH120>: for it shall be upon my people <WH5971>, it shall be upon all the princes <WH5387> of Israel <WH3478>: terrors <WH4048> by reason of <WH413> the sword <WH2719> shall be upon my people <WH5971>: strike <WH5606> therefore upon your thigh <WH3409>.
Because it is a trial <WH974>, and what if the sword show contempt to <WH3988> even the rod <WH7626>? it shall be no more <WH5002>, says the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>.

You therefore <WH1121>, son of man <WH120>, prophesy <WH5012>, and strike <WH5221> your hands <WH3709> together <WH5221>, and let the sword <WH2719> be doubled <WH3717> the third <WH7992> time <WH2719>, the sword of the slain <WH2491>: it is the sword <WH2719> of the great <WH1419> men that are slain <WH2491>, which enters into their private chambers <WH2314>.

I have set <WH5414> the point <WH19> of the sword <WH2719> against all their gates <WH8179>, that their heart <WH3820> may faint <WH4127>, and their ruins <WH4383> be multiplied <WH7235>: ah <WH253>! it is made <WH6213> bright <WH1300>, it is wrapped up <WH4593> for the slaughter <WH2874>.
Go you one way or other <WH258>, either on <WH7760> the right hand <WH3231>, or on the left <WH8041>, wherever <WH575> your face <WH6440> is set <WH3259>.
I will also strike <WH5221> my hands <WH3709> together <WH3709>, and I will cause my fury <WH2534> to rest <WH5117>: I the Lord <WH3068> have said it <WH1696>.
The word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me again <WH559>, saying,

Also <WH1121>, you son of man <WH120>, appoint <WH7760> you two <WH8147> ways <WH1870>, that the sword <WH2719> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> may come <WH935>: both two <WH8147> shall come forth <WH3318> out of one <WH259> land <WH776>: and choose <WH1254> you a place <WH3027>, choose <WH1254> it at the head <WH7218> of the way <WH1870> to the city <WH5892>.
Appoint <WH7760> a way <WH1870>, that the sword <WH2719> may come <WH935> to Rabbath <WH7237> of the Ammonites <WH1121>, and to Judah <WH3063> in Jerusalem <WH3389> the fortified <WH1219>.

For the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> stood <WH5975> at the parting <WH517> of the way <WH1870>, at the head <WH7218> of the two <WH8147> ways <WH1870>, to use <WH7080> divination <WH7081>: he made his arrows <WH2671> bright <WH7043>, he consulted <WH7592> with images <WH8655>, he looked <WH7200> in the liver <WH3516>.

At his right hand <WH3225> was the divination <WH7081> for Jerusalem <WH3389>, to appoint <WH7760> captains <WH3733>, to open <WH6605> the mouth <WH6310> in the slaughter <WH7524>, to lift up <WH7311> the voice <WH6963> with shouting <WH8643>, to appoint <WH7760> battering rams <WH3733> against the gates <WH8179>, to cast <WH8210> a mountain <WH5550>, and to build <WH1129> a fort <WH1785>.

And it shall be unto them as a false <WH7723> divination <WH7080> in their sight <WH5869>, to them that have sworn <WH7650> oaths <WH7621>: but he will call to memory <WH2142> the iniquity <WH5771>, that they may be taken <WH8610>.

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Because you have made your iniquity <WH5771> to be remembered <WH2142>, in that your transgressions <WH6588> are discovered <WH1540>, so that in all your doings <WH5949> your sins <WH2403> do appear <WH7200>; because <WH2142>, I say, that you are come to memory, you shall be taken <WH8610> with the hand <WH3709>.
And you <WH2491>, profane wicked <WH7563> prince <WH5387> of Israel <WH3478>, whose day <WH3117> is come <WH935>, when <WH6256> iniquity <WH5771> shall have a end <WH7093>,

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Remove <WH5493> the diadem <WH4701>, and take off <WH7311> the crown <WH5850>: this shall not be the same <WH2063>: exalt <WH1361> him that is low <WH8217>, and abase <WH8213> him that is high <WH1364>.
I will overturn <WH5754>, overturn <WH5754>, overturn <WH5754>, it <WH7760>: and it shall be no more <WH935>, until he come whose right <WH4941> it is <WH5414>; and I will give it him.

And you <WH1121>, son of man <WH120>, prophesy <WH5012> and say <WH559>, Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069> concerning the Ammonites <WH1121>, and concerning their reproach <WH2781>; even say <WH559> you <WH2719>, The sword, the sword <WH2719> is drawn <WH6605>: for the slaughter <WH2874> it is polished <WH4803>, to consume <WH398> because of the glittering <WH1300>:

While they see <WH2372> vanity <WH7723> unto you <WH7080>, while they divine a lie <WH3577> unto you <WH5414>, to bring you upon the necks <WH6677> of them that are slain <WH2491>, of the wicked <WH7563>, whose day <WH3117> is come <WH935>, when <WH6256> their iniquity <WH5771> shall have a end <WH7093>.
Shall I cause it to return <WH7725> into his sheath <WH8593>? I will judge <WH8199> you in the place <WH4725> where you were created <WH1254>, in the land <WH776> of your nativity <WH4351>.

And I will pour out <WH8210> my indignation <WH2195> upon you <WH6315>, I will blow against you in the fire <WH784> of my wrath <WH5678>, and deliver <WH5414> you into the hand <WH3027> of brutish <WH1197> men <WH582>, and skillful <WH2796> to destroy <WH4889>.

You shall be for fuel <WH402> to the fire <WH784>; your blood <WH1818> shall be in the midst <WH8432> of the land <WH776>; you shall be no more remembered <WH2142>: for I the Lord <WH3068> have spoken it <WH1696>.
